name: Rural Payments Service
description: Make or update rural payments claims for farming schemes including Basic Payment Scheme, Countryside Stewardship, and Sustainable Farming Incentive
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Find Farm and Land Payment Data
description: Search CAP payments received by beneficiaries under Rural Development, Direct Aids and Market Schemes
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Check for Flooding in England
description: Real-time flood warnings and river level information for England

name: Sign Up for Flood Warnings
description: Register to receive free flood warnings by telephone, mobile, email or SMS

name: Get a Rod Fishing Licence
description: Purchase rod fishing licences for salmon, trout, freshwater fish, smelt or eel in England and Wales

name: IPAFFS - Import of Products, Animals, Food and Feed System
description: Notify authorities about imports of animals, animal products, high-risk food and feed, and plants to Great Britain

name: Waste Carriers Registration Service
description: Register or renew as a waste carrier, broker or dealer in England

name: Countryside Stewardship Grant Finder
description: Find information about Countryside Stewardship options, capital items and supplements for environmental land management
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Apply for Export Health Certificate
description: Apply for export health certificates to export live animals and animal products from England, Scotland and Wales

name: Cattle Tracing System Online
description: Report cattle movements and manage cattle records with the British Cattle Movement Service

name: Register as Poultry or Bird Keeper
description: Register as a keeper of less than 50 poultry or other captive birds with APHA for disease control

name: Report Dead Wild Birds
description: Report dead wild birds to help monitor and control avian influenza (bird flu)

name: Bring Pet to Great Britain
description: Requirements for bringing pet dogs, cats or ferrets to Great Britain including pet passports and health certificates
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Apply for Water Abstraction or Impounding Licence
description: Apply for a licence to abstract more than 20 cubic metres of water per day or to impound water

name: Manage Water Abstraction Licence Online
description: Manage water abstraction or impoundment licences using the online service

name: Apply for Marine Licence
description: Apply for a marine licence for construction, dredging, or other activities in UK marine waters

name: Register Waste Exemptions
description: Register exemptions to store, treat, use or dispose of waste without a permit

name: Report Environmental Incident
description: Report environmental incidents including pollution, flooding, and poaching to the Environment Agency 24/7 hotline

name: Check Long-Term Flood Risk
description: Check the long-term flood risk for any location in England

name: Plant Health Controls
description: Guidance on plant health import and export controls to prevent spread of plant pests and diseases

name: UK Plant Health Information Portal
description: Comprehensive portal for plant health import and export requirements, regulations and guidance
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Report Catch Return
description: Report salmon and sea trout catch returns for England and Wales

name: Report Illegal Fishing in England
description: Report illegal fishing activities in England to the Environment Agency

name: Report Dead or Injured Animal
description: Report dead or injured wild animals for welfare or disease surveillance purposes
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Report Stranded Whale or Dolphin
description: Report stranded whales, dolphins, porpoises, marine turtles and basking sharks
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Funding for Farmers
description: Overview of funding schemes and grants available for farmers and land managers including SFI, Countryside Stewardship and rural payments
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Request Flooding History
description: Request historical flooding data for properties in England

name: Permission to Work on River, Flood or Sea Defence
description: Apply for permission to carry out work on or near a river, flood defence or sea defence

name: Report Veterinary Medicine Problem
description: Report suspected adverse events or quality defects with veterinary medicines

name: Freshwater Rod Fishing Rules
description: Fishing regulations, byelaws and rules for freshwater fishing in England

name: Hunting and Shooting Wildlife
description: Rules and regulations for lawful hunting and shooting of wildlife in England
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Tree Preservation Orders and Trees in Conservation Areas
description: Guidance on tree preservation orders and protected trees in conservation areas
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Woodland Grants and Incentives
description: Overview of available woodland creation and management grants including England Woodland Creation Offer and Woodland Creation Planning Grant

name: Farm Carbon Calculator
description: Free industry-leading tool for farmers to measure carbon footprint including emissions and sequestration
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Register Biomass Supplier
description: Register as a supplier of sustainable biomass fuel
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Seasonal Worker Visa
description: Apply for a seasonal worker visa to work in horticulture and poultry sectors in the UK

name: Agricultural Workers Rights
description: Information about employment rights for agricultural workers in England
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Check if You Need a Licence to Abstract Water
description: Check whether you need a licence to take water from surface or underground sources

name: Avian Influenza (Bird Flu) Guidance
description: Guidance on prevention, detection and control of avian influenza in poultry and captive birds

name: Managing Wildlife on Your Land
description: Guidance for landowners on managing protected species and wildlife habitats
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Prepare for Flooding
description: Guidance on how to prepare your property and family for flooding

name: Help During a Flood
description: What to do before, during and immediately after a flood

name: After a Flood
description: Recovery guidance and support available after flooding

name: Report Flood Cause
description: Report flooding incidents and contributing factors to help improve flood defences

description: Find out how to safely dispose of hazardous waste from households and businesses

name: Report Fly-Tipping
description: Report illegal dumping of waste to local authorities
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Rubbish Collection Day
description: Find your local rubbish and recycling collection days
department: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

name: Check Your Business is in a Protected Area
description: Find out if your business is located in a protected area of countryside

description: Apply for a licence to release non-native wildlife and plants
